intro: Pirate: Th' glass did not break that easy, mate. That be one strong glass not t' say more.
Parrot: That be interestin' though, why arent th' city fightin' back? Maybe they have a secret or two? What do ye think?
Pirate: Oh, arr, mate, i think yer feelin' be right. There be somethin' shady about this here city.
Pirate: Let's get th' fire already, whatever th' secrets be, our cannonballs be much stronger. just one sip o' rum and  Fire in the Hole!
